Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: JimMacKBoston
Reviews.Content: Hotel Cielo is a very comfortable place to stay. The staff was excellent, rooms very nice and breakfast at half price was the best! The beach club that they offer is excellent. It's just a few blocks away and worth going. Great location on the beach with waiter service. Outside rooms can be a little noisy in the early morning from the street cleaners. Other than that, great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, wonderful staff”
Reviews.Author: ktheexplorer
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week at the Hotel Cielo. At first, I did not like that we had an interior room since we had paid for a "superior" I assumed it would have been an outside room. Miguel showed me other rooms that were available, but I decided to stay with our original room. It was darker, not much light, having no exterior windows, but the only time we were in there was to sleep, so it actually worked out great. The beds were very comfortable, and the room was very clean every day. The only issue I had with the room was that the shower pressure was not strong, at all. It took quite a while to get the shampoo out. Also our ceiling fan was a little squeaky. Other than that, I would stay here again. Its location a block from the beach was great. The restaurant downstairs had good food at good prices. They have an agreement with a beach club a couple blocks away that will get you beach chairs (and an umbrella if you are early enough). Around 10 pm or so, everything went quiet around the hotel, which made for easy sleeping. Besides the location being awesome, the staff is even better. Miguel went out of his way for us each day, helping us with taxi's, reservations, etc. The staff at night were extremely friendly as well.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Beds”
Reviews.Author: kingstupka
Reviews.Content: This is an adorable property with great staff. The room was clean and nicely decorated but most importantly had the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on in Mexico. I travel to Playa del Carmen frequently and can say that this is a great place to stay, better than most by far. I will stay here again as long as the rates stay reasonable... I hope they do! The location is great and in a very safe and fun city. Don't be afraid to travel here. I go a few times a year, travel up and down the coast in rental cars and public busses and have never encountered any problems. Mexico is a wonderful country with fabulous people. Trouble will not find you unless you go looking for it.

Reviews.Title: “unexpected treasure”
Reviews.Author: richy b
Reviews.Content: My husband, daughter and I, stayed at Hotel Cielo end of Feb. for 2 weeks. This hotel was very comfortable, clean and great value indeed. We slept well, had clean, fresh linens, fresh towels, A/C, hot water, internet, cold drinking water, beach towels, cool roof view, everything you need. It had a great Mexican feel about it, cheery atmosphere, close to 5th ave shopping, and the bus. But what this hotel had that others did not , were some amazing people at the front desk. We can not say enough about them. They made this little hotel, a home away from home. We felt like we were family. There were several great staff, but the two that we had most often, and who we will remember, were Miguel, and Simone. They were both excellent. Miguel, was by far the most efficient, helpful, intuitive, reliable, willing, and honest staff member we have ever encountered on our travels. He made the Cielo a warm, friendly place to come and go from. He always had a friendly smile, and time for you. He makes this hotel a five star. We also met the manager at the front desk once, Steven, I believe his name was, an American; and we wished he would have taken the time to have a drink, or share a meal with his guests, as he seemed intriguing, maybe next time. He is obviously running this hotel efficiently. We spent a week there, and ate next door at the restaurant, every morning. The food was good. You are right in the heart of things at the Cielo. Again, our hats off to MIGUEL! keep up the smiling hospitality my friend.

Reviews.Title: “5 STAR SERVICE !!!!”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: This is a Great little hotel. Hotel Cielo is a hacienda, botiqueish, cool little hotel that drums to their own beat. Rooms are cool, old world meets new world, hacienda style with Awesome mattresses which are hard to come by here, we slept like babys. Rustic style furnishing, new linens, great A/C,hot water, Internet was good, love the cold water in the halls, nice touch. The staff were wonderful, they are really concerned about your stay & will go out of their way to accommodate you. Had a chat with Steve the owner & we got the same feeling from him as well, he really cares, sent us to restaurants that he eats at, cenotes that he goes to, even sent us into the back streets too eat some real local flavor, my wife was so scared..... but everyone was so nice, the chicken was the best I ever had, so delicious. We felt like such fools, so ignorant, Playa is probably safer then where I live in NY & I am paying $12,000.00 a year in property taxes, go figure, I know now you really cant trust the media. After our "adventure", we ventured out even more. What we loved the most, was the service, I give you 5 Stars, we felt like we knew everyone for a long time, I cant explain it, but what ever you guys are doing, its working, I had to drag my wife out of there, we both didn't want to leave. Kudos to everyone at Hotel Cielo, its a place where everyone wants to come back, we met a few return guests & so will we. Thank you for a great vacation. Sincerely John

Reviews.Title: “Perfect jumping off point”
Reviews.Author: Duglyuckling
Reviews.Content: Walked up to reception and said ola, and Miguel the manager already knew my name. Beautiful little hotel 50 feet from 5th ave and 1 block to the ADO bus station. Rooms are cheery and mexi-boutique with extremely comfortable beds. Complaints nada, weak wifi maybe. 50% off breakfast next door is excellent at really good restaurant. Terrific value, we did 2 nights here then 3 in Tulum at Cabanas la Luna and finished with 5 nights at Gran Bahia Sian Ka'an. It was all so easy because the bus is right there at Cielo.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and true Mexican feel”
Reviews.Author: petti
Reviews.Content: After travelling through Mexico for 2 weeks, we stayed at Hotel Cielo at the end of our trip. This Hotel was refreshing way to finish our holiday. True Mexican decor, very comfortbale . The staff were very friendly and helpful, photocopied documents for us, (at no cost). Location is right in the centre of town. Restaurant next door was our afternoon cocktail meeting venue and served complimentary snacks. Breakfast was good value for Hotel guests (50% discount)

Reviews.Title: “Cielo: Great Staff and good vibe”
Reviews.Author: thecarfinder
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend stayed at Cielo for a 3 nights in Feb 2012, the room was nice, but smelt musty and view out of the window was terrible. It was generally a very clean hotel, and i loved the feel of the place. I would recommend it to everyone as a good hotel. The breakfast next door was great value at 50% off, you should have a breakfast buritto! The staff were very friendly and the bed was extremely comfortable but unbelievable squeaky!

Reviews.Title: “Cielo - great location, small clean room, nice vibe.”
Reviews.Author: creep1974
Reviews.Content: room small nice clean has everything a low maint traveler needs. Breakfat next door was 50% off and very very good. If i was staying somewhere else I would go there for full price. The owner was nice and recommends some restaurants and things to do. In playa there a re a lot of bad restaurants (and many good ones) so this is very helpful. I dont think they have any beach club affiliation and no pool. Pls correct me if I'm wrong that w/b the only downside. Without hesitation I would stay here again, the convenience factor (walking distance with heavy bags from 5th ave bus station and everything else) is off the charts.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Cielo is Great!”
Reviews.Author: hmeril
Reviews.Content: After spending the previous 5 weeks "Adventure" travelling in Central America, Hotel Cielo was sheer luxury! Everything was modern, clean and bright and everything worked. The location is great, the staff, especially Miguel at the front desk, were wonderful and the french toast at the restaurant next door (where you get a discount for breakfast) was to die for.

Reviews.Title: “What a gem”
Reviews.Author: rosemary_parlour
Reviews.Content: Discovered this hotel quite by accident while having breakfast next door. A girlfriend and I shared the family room for three nights and just loved it. We couldnt believe the great location, one block from the beach and around the corner from 5th avenue and it was also so quiet for sleeping and what a 'dream' to experience a great nights sleep on their brand new pillow top mattresses. Loved our little balcony after a hard day at the playa. Miguel and the staff made us feel like family. Can,t wait to see them again and stay in this great hotel. They really have got it right in a very low key and polite manner.

Reviews.Title: “We tried it and loved it!”
Reviews.Author: cormac55
Reviews.Content: After staying in another boutique hotel for years we decided to try this hotel, here's a small review. WHAT WE LOVED: The staff, very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. The beds were the most comfortable I've ever slept in, in PDC. Crisp beautiful linens, no "doubtful clean" beadspread but a quilt is available if you get cold - not really imaginable. The intimate hotel is small but rooms and their entrances were very private and secure, almost like going to your upstairs bedroom at home. The proximity to great restaurants of every taste and budget. The beach club arrangements with Wicky's were perfect. The great pedestrian 5th Ave. and the beach both were steps away. The 50% breakfast discount at one of the most popular restaurants,Carboncitos, just next door, was a nice perk. WHAT WE LIKED: The homey Mexican art decor, the shower and bathroom space and the large shelving area for clothes storage - WITH hangars (sometimes almost non-existant in hotels). There are water coolers (no fridge) and flushable toilets (some hotels discourage this). The roof top is a great place to relax after a day of sightseeing and is in the middle of a remodeling phase. The bar wil be nice, with beautiful views. MISC: TV is available and when we asked that our TV be moved a little for better viewing it was done immediately. We had no need for a phone. Miguel was gracious enough to offer us a choice of rooms, especially one with a larger bed after one night - we had not asked but he overheard our concern about it. The air conditioning and overhead fan were fine-quiet, as was our room. There are nice "black out" type draperies for those who want to sleep a little longer in the morning. We love the early morning sun so we didn't need to shut them. I liked that the owner was on premise and we are interested in learning about his endeavor in Tulum concerning a green/eco friendly hotel. I'm sure it will do well. We laughed on hearing one of his anecdotes about a shopping trip - " I'll take 40 mattresses to go". Very clean and comfortable is this hotel. I'm glad I made the switch. All in all, I hope to make this my new home there and felt I was. Room prices were very, very reasonable for your stay and experience.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Cielo is a great value!”
Reviews.Author: NorthBeach_Lover
Reviews.Content: Rooms are clean, no insects, Air conditioners work great and no funky smells and Beds were very comfy. Breakfast was very good, staff was wonderful. Beach is 30 yards from door and $10 rents you 2 padded lounge chairs w/umbrella for the entire day with access to shower & bathrooms and some live music in afternoon. Festively noisy on the street-facing rooms but if you're such a light sleeper then choose a garden facing room. Ferry dock is 2 blocks away, bus station is 1 block away. $5 taxi ride to Walmart or Chedraui Grocery Store. Great food at Babe's noodle-bar on 10th Street, Cuban Jazz Club rocks with Salsa Dancing, $24 1-hr Massage-Yes that's NOT a Typo. We stayed for 7 nights and they gave us the last night free! Great value for such a nice hotel with a perfect location.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Service!!!”
Reviews.Author: Fruggenaire
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 5 nights and did not want to leave. We were greeted with big smiles and made felt very welcomed. The rooms were immaculately cleaned and the beds were super comfy. Beach is 1 minutes walk away and the hotel is situated right on 5th avenue which is where all the stores, restaurants, bars and amenities are situated. Try the breaky at the hotels restaurant, the smoothies are sooo delish!! Free wifi was great too. Thank you to Miguel, every morning you greeted us with a smile and in the evenings would ask about our day and helped us with all our questions.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Cathy S
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel for a week in February 2012. First time being in Playa del Carmen. Miguel and Steve and all the others were just great. Miguel was always willing to help us out with our Spanish and on telling us how to get to where we wanted to go. The food at the restaurant was great. The french toast was out of this world for breakfast. Was able to get my coffee every morning with no problems at all. The room was on facing the street but you also had a view of the ocean that was a block away. You were supplied with beach towels to go to the ocean and they also have a spot where you can go to get chairs for the beach to relax in. The rooms were very clean and quiet. They had all that you would need. A water cooler was available for you to fill your water bottles or glasses with whenever you needed it. The rooms were cleaned every day. I had no complaints what so ever and will definetely be back there to stay. We could not have asked for a more personal friendly experience as we had staying here. They were all just great people and the hotel was great also. If you want a nice place to stay, stay here you will not regret it. The beds were also the best. I would of even liked to have brought mine home it was so comfortable. Thanks for a great stay Cathy R Upstate New York

Reviews.Title: “One of the nicest, friendliest little hotels in Playa”
Reviews.Author: Chris L
Reviews.Content: A very short walk to the beach. A great little restaurant on the main floor...you have to try the chicken soup....mmmmm .... there is an unbelievable roof top deck. If you have a problem with anything , ask the staff... they are hands on. They will do everything they can to make your stay the best it can be. The price is right, the rooms are beautiful. It is just off 5th ave.. its quiet... clean... safe....Its a 5 star in my books Chris Lunder Calgary Alberta.

Reviews.Title: “Super location and value”
Reviews.Author: tonyandk
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd stay at Cielo. For slightly more $, you can get one is the larger rooms which we enjoyed. This is an excellent location as 4th street has some of the best non tourist restaurants and is about 100 yards from the beach. While breakfast isn't a big deal me, my wife enjoyed it very much. This place is a bargain.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, friendly staff, very good restaurant downstairs”
Reviews.Author: Ric T
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel Cielo. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was clean, and traditional decor to our liking. We had a great balcony overlooking the action on the street, but underestimated the amount of noise at night. This was not an annoyance but presented somewhat of a challenge putting our son to bed. The restaurant downstairs has excellent food - you will find it packed at dinner time, so reserve a table if you're unwilling to wait. Our room had a fan, and air conditioning, but did not have a phone.

Reviews.Title: “Over rated and over priced”
Reviews.Author: sluffer
Reviews.Content: I booked the Hotel Cielo because of the good reviews on Trip Advisor but unfortunately the hotel did not live up to its billing. Problems included the following: -I paid for a queen but got a double bed. -the hot water in the shower was undependable. -the only piece of furniture in the room besides the bed was one small chair. -the TV reception was fuzzy and the screen microscopically small -the WIFI did not work in the room. This is a very mediocre hotel and it does not come close to justifying the prices they charge!

Reviews.Title: “The most comfortable hotel we found!”
Reviews.Author: Lovejoy2012
Reviews.Content: The owner was standing at the desk when we arrived, travel weary, just looking for a comfortable bed after so many hard, old, worn out one's in other hotels. I also wanted a beautiful place, and this hotel really filled the bill. It is truly beautiful, with lots of details that are really special, all Mexican hand painted tile throughout, beautiful hand painted sinks, and a fantastic roof top patio for romantic evenings. We only stayed two nights, and the staff was exceptional, very friendly and helpful and the restaurant is also great. We'll definitely go back! The location is quiet enough for this area, and it's one block to the most beautiful beach I've ever seen....

Reviews.Title: “Convenient friendly and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Kathleen D
Reviews.Content: Just stumbled upon El Cielo in Playa and could not have found better. The beds and pillows were the best we experienced while touring the Riviera and the hotel is only a rock's through away. The staff was very friendly and the room well priced. We got more then our money's worth. We will return.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay, comfortable beds”
Reviews.Author: Dustin H
Reviews.Content: Stayed here just recently for 7 days. The location is excellent right on 4th and 5th perfect walking distance to some of the better sections of the beach. Met the owner, Steve, who is taking a personal hand in the overall operation of the hotel and it shows!! The staff were amazingly polite and helpful. The beds are the most comfortable beds I have ever slept in while in Playa Del Carmen, where at these smaller hotels it is common to find beds as hard as stone. The room was very clean, while the view wasn't the greatest, who cares!! The rooms were very quite as we were on the back side. And although it might not sound like a big deal, there are water jug stations at 2 locations allowing you to refill your water bottles with fresh water, which saves you the MAJOR HASSLE of making sure you always have water on hand. I will visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Best beds ever!”
Reviews.Author: Hooterville_Mom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night until our condo was ready. Wished we had stayed longer! I have slept on my share of crappy beds on Mexico...And to me if the bed is crappy and you don't sleep good, nothing else matters. These beds are AWESOME. Pillow top...wish I had one at home. No exaggeration, the best bed I have ever slept on. The location isn't bad either. We were upgraded for free and had a room where we could stand out on the balcony and look at the activity on the street. Lots of interesting people watching. It was quiet too, the only improvement I could suggest would be to make the curtains wider or install some shades where one would have the option to totally darken the room if you wanted to sleep in. Would definitely stay here again, though.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: jjsoucy
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed this place. The staff is incredible. The beach is close and you are right in the heart of playa. It was recommended from my friend Bobby and he was right when he said, "you won't be sorry". Can't wait to get back!

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer E
Reviews.Content: Loved this hotel. We came a day early to playa and decided to stay here. The hotel is clean and cute, and the prices were good. The beach is a block or two away and is beautiful. This is located right on fifth and once you step out, you are in the heart of playa. Roberto was very helpful, all the staff were gracious and made you feel welcomed. I highly recommend this place!

Reviews.Title: “Love!!”
Reviews.Author: EnviroGirl
Reviews.Content: Really liked this place! THe staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Roberto, Miguel and Simone all helped me out at various steps along the way. I highly recommend the food next door/below - Carboncitos. Great breakfast and pretty good dinners, too. Rooms were clean, I think the hotel is beautiful, and great location in Playa. Steps from the beach - I think this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and nice affordable digs in Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: JRBNMM11
Reviews.Content: I am a returning customer to this hotel - have stayed there 2 times. The rooms are clean, comfortable and updated. The decor taps into the local flavor and colors. The staff is very helpful and will assist you with day trips, transportation, reservations and any needs you have. The food (breakfast included in your stay) is VERY good. Best guac in town- I swear!! The location to everything is perfect - the beaches, dining, shopping, nightlife are all in walking distance. I highly recommend this hotel to those who are not looking for the all-inclusive experience - you will not be disappointed!!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with warm & friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: TexasTravelerIV
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd stay at Hotel Cielo and by far my favorite! The hotel is right off 5th and a block from the beach - you wont miss a thing. It is also close to the bus station and a short walk to Wal Mart or Mega. With the room you get a free breakfast & beach passes to a local beach club - the kind with the beds to chill out on! Hotel Cielo is clean and in a great location and has a great active owner who I had the pleasure to meet on my last stay. The front desk staff was very helpful with restaurant recommendations, questons and service. This is a great value and I will stay again! - as soon as possible!

Reviews.Title: “great spot near the beach”
Reviews.Author: KarenfromDC
Reviews.Content: We got a terrific last minute deal here the week after x-mas. The location -- half a block from the pedestrian zone and a block from the beach -- was ideal. The hotel was comfortable and the breakfast, as others have noted, was terrific. Obviously this a very different experience than the all-inclusives that dominate the area, but if you want to be in the heart of the town with access to shopping, restuarants and the beach, this is a good choice, especially for the budget conscious.

Reviews.Title: “Great location perfect for Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: noconnor54
Reviews.Content: Fantastic location and newly updated with new bedspreads drapes and accessories. The hotel is very quaint and in keeping with the area. This hotel is situated in a very stategic location fingertips to shopping, dining and the beach. You will not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Playa!”
Reviews.Author: Nuno O
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Playa del Carmen for nealy 10 years and there is no other hotel i would rather stay at...the staff are extremely kind and helpful, the location is fantastic, and the food at Carboncitos is out of this world! Hotel Cielo makes you feel at home...you may never want to leave!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: Shiran S
Reviews.Content: We stay in the hotel one week in october and we wish that we can stay more... The rooms was pampered and were kept clean as well!! Fresh towels are always available. The hotel is in a great location, close to the main street- the beach located down the block is beautiful, You can get chairsand and umbrellas for free because u are a Cielo guest! the hotel also close to the clubs..what is good when you stay a long night at the clubs and drink :) Im recommend "Carboncitos" which is the resturant downstairs..! the breakfast was very tasty! The staff were extremely accommodating and very very nice!!! I want to mention Miguel- lovely, funny, professional, polite, patient man, and it was more than pleasure to meet you! XOXO We will definitely be returning to this hotel, we cant wait...

Reviews.Title: “No Improvements Necessary”
Reviews.Author: Paula M
Reviews.Content: My wife and 2 year old daughter and I were staying in Playa over night, in transit from Belize to our home. We were recommended a hotel on 5th. I walked several blocks and several blocks more to check out the hotel on 5th. The price was high and there was no one to carry our bags all that way. I decided to look around on my way back to the car. I found Hotel Cielo, just around the corner from 5th. Great price, good rooms, and extremely helpful staff to every single one of our needs. Taxi prices quoted and arranged for us, pick up right from our door. Even the bartender gave me as much ice as we needed to keep milk temperature down for the night for my daughter. Everyone at Hotel Cielo is so cheery and helpful there is no way to go wrong. Thank you for taking such great care of my family and I. If its good enough for my family, then i would recommend it is good enough for yours to. Mr. Peake Canada

Reviews.Title: “Cozy, comfy, quaint, cute.”
Reviews.Author: csf_in_pdc
Reviews.Content: What more needs to be said? I've stayed here a few times and I'm never disappointed. 50% off those wonderful enfrijoladas at breakfast is icing on the cake!

Reviews.Title: “fantastic place”
Reviews.Author: mattewz66
Reviews.Content: I went to cielo in nov with my wife and we spent one of our most incredible days! They gave us an upgrade because we were celebrating my birthday. We loved the rooms, they are nice and clean. The location is fantastic few steps from the beach and the staff was so helpfull specialy miguel. I cant wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “All your stuff will be safe/Honestos”
Reviews.Author: Jorge M
Reviews.Content: Im from argentina and i stayed for 2 nights the first time, i liked the place, the rooms are nice and the guy at the reception so friendly and helpfull. I planed to spent couple days in cozumel because i love to dive. I arrenged everything with the receptionist for a second stay after my trip to cozumel and when i was leaving i was in a rush because i had to catch the ferry to cozumel. After 4 days i came back to hotel cielo and i got a huge surprise... because of my rush leaving to cozumel i forgot an envelope with 2 credit cards and about 1200USD cash and some traveler checks, when the receptionist miguel told me about that and gave me the envelope i was speachless. I was thinking to travel to miami for shooping and stuff, and i was pretty sure that envelope was in my case. How wrong was i... the receptionist gave to me and i just took it and run to my room and everything was there!! 2 years ago i went to dominican republic and one gold earrings from my wife was stolen from the room and after that i decided never to leave a single valuable thing in my room and after this happen and now i got all my money back i feel like thers still good pleople. Im very happy about this, i know it was my fault, but there are some actions that need to be shared not only to say good rooms, good service, great location. The night before i left i meet the owner and i told him... you have the right people! If anyone from the hotel reads this please say thank you to Miguel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Experience!!!”
Reviews.Author: room16
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Cielo for 2 weeks. The staff was extremely helpful and friendly. Every day we were greeted with genuine smiles and greetings! Any requests we had were seen to quickly. The hotel is safe and quiet with the bonus of being a block away from the beach. Credos also to the owners Steve and Russell who very personable and accessible to guests. We felt like we've known everyone at the hotel for years...

Reviews.Title: “home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Hope R
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a relaxing, fun, welcoming, entertaining, and authentic place to stay, Hotel Cielo is the place to go. With a friendly staff you can never go wrong. Hotel Cielo is in a perfect loctation between the town and the beach! For many of us Mexico is a long way from home but Cielo gives a homey vibe in which you will feel like you never left in the first place. Besides the friendly staff, and homey vibe, the food at Cielo is incredible! In my opinion the food at Cielo is amazing. You can never go wrong with the Mexican style homemade chicken soup or the amazing pastors when you get back from the beach. Hotel Cielo is the best place to be in Playa and not to mention has the best rates!

Reviews.Title: “The service: more than expected!!!”
Reviews.Author: CortZ99
Reviews.Content: We traveled to mexico for our holidays and we decided to stop couple nights in playa del carmen, while looking for a hotel we found this hotel its small one, but the service was so much more than we expected... since we arrived there was a receptionist who become our best friend in mexico: miguel. he recieved us smiling showing all the rooms and giving nice sugestions everytime, the best advices for visiting places, ruins, beachs, the best restaurants, he allways have a solucion or an option, never was a no. when thinking about our last stay in mexico we are pretty sure that without that recomendations maybe we wont have the same amaizing experience that we had. About the hotel, was allways clean, those girls allways put a nice towel decoration in our room, we loved it! They have a roof, and the view is just amaizing, you have to see it! All the personal in hotel cielo was nice, even the mainteniance guy was nice, at reception the other guys are not even the half of miguel but with him we were fine. the location is another must, few steps away from the beach, and right next to the fifth avenue, at night there was any noise place nerby so we also had a nice sleep there. We had the opportunitie to meet the owner and we was so nice. We felt so sad when we had to leave, Miguel and the staff make us felt like in home.

Reviews.Title: “best hotel in playa”
Reviews.Author: bobby b
Reviews.Content: wow, a great boutique hotel that just keeps on getting better.This is the third year we have been to to hotel cielo and we absolutely love it.The restaurant has some of the best food in playa,and the drinks are amazing.The staff could not be any more accommodating,the rooms are spotless and we can't wait to go back in february.Great job guys and keep up the great work.

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great value, nice people!”
Reviews.Author: evemariah
Reviews.Content: A very nice, mexican-authentic and cute hotel. Rooms and bathroom are clean, equipped with a TV, basic but with love to details. The staff makes the difference and is really helpful and friendly. We were there during a hurrican and manager and employees were all very helpful and took good care of windows and guests. The location is perfect. Still right at 5th, but quiet at the same time. You have a rooftop where you have nice view of the ocean. We met young and interesting people and you get vouchers for the restaurant (which is in the same building) for breakfast, lunch and dinner -> super deal. Overall and amazing experience and with the insider restaurants-, playa del carmen - and tour tips from the from the staff we had a wonderful vacation! Would always go back!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended!!”
Reviews.Author: Spectorit
Reviews.Content: Beautiful , clean hotel. The owner and employees are kind and welcoming. Two min from the beach!And if that's not enough The hotel has a beach club where u can hang out for free!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Cord0036
Reviews.Content: I went to Playa del Carmen for a vacation with a friend. This was a great and inexpensive hotel .. and very close to the beach. The service was great and the hotel was very clean and comfortable. I would definitely recommend!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful, Perfect, Amazing.”
Reviews.Author: salemk
Reviews.Content: We had an AMAZING time staying at this hotel. The staff were some of the friendliest and you could tell they really wanted to do anything they could to make our stay more enjoyable. The rooms were beautiful and extremely clean. Ours had a massive shower too. They are also only a block away from the beautiful beach and had a deal with a very nice beach bar/restaurant where you get a free queen size bed with umbrella by the ocean because your staying with Cielo. And they offer a 50% discount for breakfast at the very good restaurant next door which makes the prices the same as street food. Another thing we really enjoyed was a list of restaurants they give you that is filled with secret places that mostly only the locals know about. We tried a few and were amazed at how much better they were then the tourist ones on 5th AVE and the huge price difference. We will never stay anywhere else in that area again, they have truly raised the bar. P.S. The shower in room #2 is huge and a personal favorite, just please dont reserve it when I want to come back. :-) Enjoy. Salem

Reviews.Title: “Great service. Very nice hotel and lovely staff!!”
Reviews.Author: Einavllll
Reviews.Content: We had a really nice time. The room was good, not expensive and clean. The staff and owner were welcoming and very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect getaway”
Reviews.Author: EddieMD
Reviews.Content: From the moment I walked in to Hotel Cielo I knew I had made the right choice. The staff was great, very warm and friendly. The rooms was great and the food amazing. Everyday was better than the last and the only negative I have to say was that I didn't stay longer. We were given great places to visit and activities to do from the staff. There aren't enough words to describe what a great trip we had and we have Hotel Cielo to say thank you for it!!! Book your next trip here and I promise you won't go wrong!!

Reviews.Title: “clean , affordable place”
Reviews.Author: alexie810
Reviews.Content: Loved Hotel Cielo ! Theyhad a promo when I booked online so our fourth night was free and then we had an upgrade on our room when we checked in - we had a balcony and partial view of the beach .The room was clean and the staff are wonderful ,friendly and helpful .For an affordable price Hotel Cielo offers you the best basic accomodations you need . The weather was terrible when we arrived but we made the most of it and enjoyed the tours, views and local food ..thanks to the tips that Steve ( the owner ) and Miguel Angel gave us . Playa is a safe place to visit to and will definitely come back and Yes I have already recommended this hotel to my friends and family !

Reviews.Title: “Another great visit!”
Reviews.Author: Markp779
Reviews.Content: My wife and I wanted a short stay in Playa del Carmen after a week of relaxing on the beaches down the coast in Akumal. We returned to Hotel Cielo for our second stay there in 18 months. We like the small boutique atmosphere of the hotel. We were given the keys to our room, by the friendly guy at check in. and we were happy to be back. This hotel is situated perfectly in the heart of the action, just off 5th ave. The rooms are nice and bright, our balcony overlooked 4th street. the staff are very accomodating, and helpful. (make sure you ask for the beach club access, for Mosquito beach club. Check out the rooftop patio, great views of Playa, and the sunset. Los carbonitas in the hotel, is a good small resturaunt, and breakfast is included. We met one of the owners of the hotel, and we talked about our trip, and Mexico in general. Playa Del Carmen, and the Yucatan is a wonderful, safe vacation destination. The Mexican people are very friendly and helpfull, if you speak a few words of spanish, they will like you even more. Another great visit to Hotel Cielo..

Reviews.Title: “Bellisimo !!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: roberto l
Reviews.Content: I travel with my brother to travel Mexico. We walk the street and find Hotel Cielo, so nice. The building is a Mexican style with many different kind of rooms. The location great, very close to beach, many restaurants. Good night life many things to do. Hotel is quite at night which is good, many other hotels are near night life and very loud, Cielo is 5 minuta walk to go. It is also good because not far from many ruins, 2-3hours away, so nice to come back and swim after trip. People in the Hotel Cielo very nice, they know alot to do. The owner very nice to, tell us many things to do,swim with whale sharks, visit a giant cave you can swim in, so beautiful. I say to my a brother I feel like home, he agree and when we come back from a Merida we stay again. We tell all our friends and family about Cielo.

Reviews.Title: “MERAVIGLIOSO.....That is Amazing in Italian”
Reviews.Author: Giorgio l
Reviews.Content: I traveled form Italy through the Mayan Riviera & I find this Beautiful little hotel. Very clean, very charming, room with ocean view, a one minute walk to the beautiful Caribbean Sea, the staff very helpful & friendly and all for an affordable price. They make me feel like I am back in my home town. I will be traveling through the Yucatan for a while & when I return to Playa, I will be staying at Hotel Cielo again. And you must check out the roof top.....bellissimo !!!!! Ciao

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful and Helpful Staff...”
Reviews.Author: YM2011
Reviews.Content: Great affordable place...close to all including beach! Love the price and the location! Excellent Value and Service. Thank You Andrea and Staff.....

Reviews.Title: “The best option to stay in Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: EstebanChavez304
Reviews.Content: Quality, confort and good treatment is not a luxury and not necessarily have to be expensive. This is what Hotel Cielo offers at the best price, fast becoming one of the best option to stay in Playa del Carmen

Reviews.Title: “A super great value”
Reviews.Author: QuintanillaSchmidt
Reviews.Content: A fantastic boutique hotel and an excellent location for being close to the beach, and the scene, but not so close you cannot sleep. A great value---attentive staff, cleverly designed rooms to maximize space and an interesting and attractive layout to the property overall with a rooftop overlook to the beach. The restaurant –Carboncitas—was a treat and moderately priced. We sat at one of the outside tables and watched the never ending scene pass by—great entertainment. The ADO bus station is just a short walk towards the Plaza Mayor so it was easy and inexpensive to get the bus to the Cancun airport.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: 04HOG
Reviews.Content: Before we go to our all-inclusive resort, we like to spend some time in Playa shopping and eating at the local restaurants. The Hotel Cielo is right off of 5th Ave, close to good shopping, 2 blocks from the beach and they have a great restaurant on property. Breakfast is included @ Carboncitos and they give guest a discount for dinner. (Both are great) Rates are reasonable, the rooms are spotless, and night noise was not an issue. We will definatly stay here again next time we are in town.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing, Good ambience, feels like locals...”
Reviews.Author: joysantana
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at Hotel Cielo for 4 nights. I got a good deal pay for 3 nights and 4th night free. Rooms is very simple and yet comfortable..Had a wonderful mexican breakfast..!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great simple place excellent restaurant with 50% of for breakfast.”
Reviews.Author: sandriloqui
Reviews.Content: Good location, decently clean , cute and simple with a great terrace up top to take in the scene. Great deal on food at their restaurant carboncitos and good food:)

Reviews.Title: “One of the warmest, loveliest experiences I've had with a hotel”
Reviews.Author: reesespiece
Reviews.Content: We were only on this hotel's property for a few hours, as we'd been staying elsewhere in Playa del Carmen, but we accidentally left our camera on the premises. It wasn't until we were in the car on the way to the airport--and running late--that we remembered the camera! As soon as we could, we called the hotel, and it turned out they not only had the camera safely put away but that they also were willing to ship it to us very quickly. Steven, the owner, was nothing but lovely, and we can't wait to go back to Playa del Carmen to spend more time at the hotel. Also, and this isn't a minor point, the restaurant associated with the hotel--Carboncitos--is delicious. We went twice. Their shrimp + bacon + cheese dish is something we're going to dream about.

Reviews.Title: “Playa Del Carmen is safe! No really, it is :)”
Reviews.Author: NYCisgood4ME
Reviews.Content: My second time here. I love all the improvements since my last stay, it shows that these people care about their property. We stayed 4 extra nights, that should really say it all. The room was clean, spacious and everything worked well. Good bed, great a/c, ocean view from the balcony and a wifi that worked 24/7, which is rare in this part of the world! Playa is SAFE to travel! This is important to note with all the negative press Mexico is getting in the US media. There is no trouble in Playa. The greatest asset of this hotel, in my opinion, is the staff. We got to know Steve the owner/storyteller and most of the frontdesk staff (thanks for all the beachtowels!) and housekeepers aside from the peeps in the restaurant. Location wise this place is situated a block from the beach and right by all the good shopping. Super quiet at night unlike some of the places down the street that are exposed to all the noise fro the clubs. Steve hooked me up with some fantastic restaurant recommendations and set me up with a local dive school to get PADI crtified, like a concierge in a 5star resort! Haha ! Thanks Steve! Hey, I'm looking forward to my next stay here, I hope to be back in January.

Reviews.Title: “Looooved the place.”
Reviews.Author: Madarar
Reviews.Content: Spent a week there. As it was my 2nd time in Playa del Carmen, have a chance to compare places I've been staying at. And I would say- I am in love with this hotel!!! Totally! And I do know that if I will ever go back, there is no doubt I'll choose the same place :)) Such a friendly people, (Steven- thank you for everything), but mostly- the atmosphere at the hotel is not even describable. Me and my mother were enjoying it more than a lot! So, thank you for such a place! And best wishes in future! P.S. Will definitely suggest your place to my friends! :)

Reviews.Title: “The best place in Playa del Carmen”
Reviews.Author: 60878Matt
Reviews.Content: A big thank you to the Steve and the staff at hotel cielo for making my stay a truely amazing and memorable one. Clean and comfortable rooms with a smile around every corner, after only a few days there I felt like part of the "familia". Centrally located only a few minutes to the beach and all sorts of shopping made Hotel Cielo the perfect place to stay for a few nights or a long week. The front desk was full of suggestions and helpful hints as to the best places to go or things to see. I know where I will be staying for all my future vacations in the Maya Riviera.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to get back”
Reviews.Author: viagnehy
Reviews.Content: great experience, really cool area. The people there are real helpful and fun. The area is perfect to relax... (specially after having been out all night)

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful & Charming with great views , yummy food & Icey cold Cervaza :)”
Reviews.Author: wilbur68
Reviews.Content: Stayed at hotel Cielo on many occasions & was never dissapointed ! Always a warm greeting with lots of helpful recommendations. There is nothing fancy about this place but that's just the way I like it. It has a wonderful Boutiquey Mexican charm about it that I Love! 1 block from the beach and in the heart of town. I love how you can just pop in for quick bite or cocktail, do a wardrobe change and out the door to take it all in again:) This place has never disappointed in any way. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for beautiful simplicity, location & helpful staff ~_•

Reviews.Title: “What a find! Love this place.”
Reviews.Author: eileend10
Reviews.Content: I have gone to Playa del Carmen several times in the last few months as I have been in the market for a condo there. Have stayed in several hotels in the centro and close to the beach. Some of them were twice the price of El Cielo and not half as nice! I found the hotel because I have eaten many times at Canrocitas, the wonderful and very reasonably priced restaurant next attached to the hotel (5 steps off of Avenida 5th, on Calle 4). Carboncitas is crazy good and I hate to say "cheap" as that can mean not do good, but this place ROCKS for the food and drink. At happy hour they have TWO tacos al carbon for 11 pesos. Do the math, that is two for a dollar. And they have the most awesome 55 peso huge margaritas ever. They bring you the best chips and multiple sauces for the tacos, including their famous pumpkin sauce, pico de galo, guacamole sauce, mmmm. When you stay at the hotel you get half priced breakfast here. Considering that all the other places I stayed give you a crappy free bfast of toast and coffee and juice, getting Carboncitas breakfasts for half price is a very good deal. Their omlets (esp. the chorizo ones) and fantastic. The special cinnamon french toast is yummy. I got one of those two and coffee (free refills) and a mango/pina/orange smothie for breakfast and was set until happy hour time every day. Now for the hotel. I asked by email for a quiet room in back and one that is cool, as it is blazing this time of yr there. What did I get? For 55 dollars (and get this, the 4th night was free) I got a huge room w/two queen beds and enough room to store the bar stools and stereo I bought for my new condo in Playa, and still had enough room to dance around the room solo. The AC was fantastic, as opposed to the ones at the other hotels I stayed in which just did not cool the rooms enough. Great TV reception, unlike two other hotels I stayed in. Several English stations and movie stations- I had something good to watch every night before drifting off to sleep after my nightly Carboncitas margarita. The staff is very nice, very friendly. I met two of the owners and also Roberto at the front desk was particularly sweet, helping me haul up the stuff I bought for the condo. Housekeepers were good and trustworthy. I left my IPad and the new stereo and stuff in the room and nothing was touched. I tipped them nicely when I left. Love this place. If my new condo can not handle everyone who comes to visit, I am recomending El Cielo to my visitors. For $165 I got 4 nights of bliss there. Oh and the rooftop is cool also. Only drawback is no pool, but with the caribbean one half block away, and AC that blasts like a fridge in the room (and celing fans), who cares. Oh also hot water, although it takes a few min. to get hot- don't give up, just wait a bit, it will get hot. Watch out for other hotels in this price range in Playa. Some look good on internet but are skany or not so friendly once you get there. EL Cielo is the real deal.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent little hotel”
Reviews.Author: beetlezb
Reviews.Content: A couple of friends recommended Hotel Cielo to us & I am so happy we chose to stay with them. Clean rooms & It´s one of my peeves Comfortable,rooms were cool, unique design, owner says they will update but we loved it, I will definitely return to see if it could be better. Centrally located, 100 feet from the beautiful Caribbean Sea, many restaurants, good night life & very tourist friendly, scuba, ruins, culture. All of the above was great, but what was the most amazing, was the owner & the staff, incredibly attentive, they really care & show great concern to assure you are enjoying your self. They create a great vibe at Hotel Cielo, they really make you want to come back. Thank you, Steve, Roberto, Miguel, thank you all for making our vacation a wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation ever!!!”
Reviews.Author: leach_jbl
Reviews.Content: We had an amazing time!!! The hotel has a wonderful rooftop to get away and watch the sunrise and sunset. The hotel is right off the main drag and so close to the beach. The staff was great and the rooms were clean and quiet with comfortable beds. A great value!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great time again”
Reviews.Author: nc-1traveler
Reviews.Content: have stayed at Cielo 4 times now and really enjoy the place and location. we really love coming back to this place and the staff make us feel so welcome. the owner Steve is a great guy and will make sure that you are taken care of. rooms are great and nice A/C. Steve keep up the good work and we will see you soon. Greg and Deb, Charlotte,NC.

Reviews.Title: “Low class hotel with cheap rate.”
Reviews.Author: trutht
Reviews.Content: The air-conditioning is extremely loud and not adjustable to the temperature. It is right on the busy street, without insolation. The hotel staff without good experience, messed up and trying very hard to make their customer to pay for their mistake. Yes, now that we had everything in writing, show them with evidence, still make the customer pay for their mistakes at the last minutes. The worse of the experience you can expect from traveling.

Reviews.Title: “At Last some good food a nice room, friendly staff and management”
Reviews.Author: Rick33012
Reviews.Content: After a long trip down to Chetamal I stumbled on an oasis. Finding good food a clean room and friendly people was everything I needed. The architecture and location was a bonus! just a few "literally" steps from the shops and shore made my stay everything I could have asked for. The manager/ co owner, Steve was also there providing color commentary that only a Newyorker could express! Great stay, Great night sleep, Great food! Thank you Steve and all your friendly staff. rick

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for everything!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: CaroPViajera
Reviews.Content: I went with my husband last april, a very good time to visit Playa del Carmen due to wheather and atmosphere. We stayed at one of the rooms downstairs and the relation quality\price is very good. Thanks to all the staff which made our stay just the best, as we were at home. Steve, thanks for the extra mattress, and for being so comprehensive with the whole situation (he is the owner and as we were not happy with our bed, the next day he just bought another mattress for us!!!!), send our regards to our compatriot Alejandra, really hope to see you guys again some time. Roberto is also a very cool guy always at our disposal to suggest the best tips. thanks the whole staff very much for making our holiday just awesome! We highly recommend this hotel, due to its location and good service. The restaurant next door, Carboncitos is the best in town, will never forget the excelent salsa pepita!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Looking forward to our next stay here!”
Reviews.Author: orangeLynn
Reviews.Content: This is a fun place to stay. We live in Merida, Yucatan, and needed a quick beach vacation. We wanted to stay in the center of all that Playa del Carmen offers, so we chose Hotel Cielo. It was the perfect place for us. Our room was clean and charming. The staff was friendly, and one of the owners was extremely helpful with great suggestions for our visit. We look forward to returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great location - and cold drinking water!”
Reviews.Author: dmdevl
Reviews.Content: I like to be close to the beach and close to the bus stop - near 5th, but not on it. Cielo fit the bill. Since I was traveling with my college-age male child two beds were important to us. In correspondence with Cielo before hand, we were assured that we could be accommodated - and we were! The staff were all very friendly and responsive and the owner took the time to give us his personal recommendations for dining. We loved all that we tried and hope to get to the rest of the list next year! We especially appreciated the water cooler station in the hallway outside our room. This is genius - every time we drew from it I gave thanks that I picked Cielo. I found the hotel mostly quiet but one night several couples were staying in the room next door and we could hear their party pretty well. Since that could happen anywhere I just waited them out (son had no problem sleeping thru). The beds are not pillow mattresses but felt ok after walking around ruins all day. The air and fan both worked well. My only small criticism would be of the adjoining restaurant, Carboncitos. A limited breakfast is included for hotel guests. We thought it adequate and inexpensive with bacon and other supplements from the regular menu but on 2 mornings we had hoped to catch a quick bite from the hotel guest menu before hopping on a bus. They couldn't provide their simple breakfast in the 30 minutes we allowed either day (couldn't be more time due to their opening time). We had to leave without food each day after sitting there for 30 minutes. On the previous 3 days I guess we were up later and didn't have a schedule so I didn't notice a delay.

Reviews.Title: “great location centrally in Playa del carmen, close to beach, shops, restaurants”
Reviews.Author: cmm_11
Reviews.Content: great restaurant with happy hour deals, clean affordable rooms, hard to find in Playa now.

Reviews.Title: “Relaxation to the max!”
Reviews.Author: jericopj
Reviews.Content: I went down a little nervous because i'm handicapped in a wheelchair. I didn't know how comfortable I would be.. When I got there, the staff made me feel as comfortable as I am at home. It was a great experience.. People are friendly, the hotel is clean and the food is great! I can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! Thank you Hotel Cielo!”
Reviews.Author: markwebber
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just finished staying at Hotel Cielo in Playa del Carmen for 4 nights because the hotel was full at our language school. This was the best thing that could have happened because we got a spacious tastefully decorated room with 2 private terraces that was only about 100-150 meters off the beach. Also we got to know Steve the owner who is always about and willing to give good advice on where to eat or for anything you need. His staff was great as well, including Miguel and Roberto, who are equally as helpful. Hotel Cielo is right off of 5th avenue but in the less busy area so we did not have the thumping of the clubs at night that you get further up the street. It is also located next to a really good restaurant ( Las Carboncitas) where you can get discounts on your meals for staying at El Cielo. Honestly, even if Steve and his staff weren't so great we would still stay there because the location and price were premium but they were the added bonus. Thank you El Cielo. We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “We felt like we were the MOST important guests”
Reviews.Author: deb11223319
Reviews.Content: We picked Hotel Cielo after reviewing photographs and youtube videos on the internet. On previous trips we stayed at large resorts in Cancun, but for this trip we wanted to enjoy Playa del Carmen. We are extremely happy that we selected Hotel Cielo. The hotel is charming and beautiful, but it was the people who made our stay so amazing. Miguel, Roberto, and Andrea, who all work the front desk are fabulous. Andrea is so helpful and cheerful; it was delight to come back to the hotel each day. In fact, we started to call the hotel "home." If you want advice about what dishes to order in restaurants, then ask Andrea. She has a genuine love for culinary delights that is contagious. Steve, a managing owner, was great too. It was obvious that he cares about the hotel. He treats his staff with respect; to me this speaks volumes about his character. He was also exceedingly helpful to us. He has many plans for the hotel that I am sure he will enact. I, however, did not see any problems that needed fixing. I thought it was perfect. We stayed at Hotel Cielo for three nights then headed over to Cozumel and then back to the Hotel Cielo. The people at Hotel Cielo worked with our unique schedule including a late departure for our flight home. The room was clean and nicely decorated. We did not notice any noise that interrupted our sleep. At night there was some music early in the evening but not later than about 9pm. In the morning the shops open at about 9am which accounted for some noise, but it did not bother us. The breakfast at Carboncitos was beyond our expectations. We expected some dried up muffins and coffee. The breakfast included choices of different freshly prepared dishes. If I could do it again, I would have eaten more dinners at Carboncitos. The prices were reasonable and the food is delicious. In fact there is a happy hour that is an excellent value that we should have taken advantage of. Across the street there are some shops. In the morning Maurice is there and he is great. If you can, I would try to give his shop some business. He won us over by never asking us to buy anything but instead sharing his love for his country. In all, we would stay at Hotel Cielo again without even looking at other options. Hotel Cielo is our Playa del Carmen "home." Thank you for a great vacation!

Reviews.Title: “You will not be dissapointed with your stay, check out our review”
Reviews.Author: senorchris
Reviews.Content: My wife, four year old son and I stayed at Hotel Cielo last night and enjoyed our stay very much. The hotel and restaurant are about 30' from 5th Ave (shopping central) and a very short block from the beach. The staff were all very friendly and outgoing, making our son feel very comfortable. Although it is so close to fifth ave., it is far enough from the nightlife that it's a faint thumping in the background, but close enough that you can be at a hopping bar in about five minutes on foot. We plan to make it a regular stop on our trips to our place in Belize. Will be staying there on our way back, as well.

Reviews.Title: “Absolute charm and coziness of Ciello and its wonderful staff and service are a great invitation for any traveller”
Reviews.Author: slava571
Reviews.Content: Ciello is a very charming hotel located in the heart of Playa del Carmen and very close to the beach. It has that special flare around it and you feel the warmth and charm right away. With its colorful, bright and spacious rooms and a wonderful décor and incredible view on the ocean, it makes you feel very cozy and comfortable. It sends you the invitation to come back and stay longer. The staff is incredible, always smiling and ready to help. The service is great, the food and the wine excellent. Ciello is definitely a great place to relax and spend your vacation and getaway. I enjoyed my stay at Ciello tremendously and I am definitely going back. I would gladly recommend it to all my friends and relatives.

Reviews.Title: “Very cute hotel in a great location, loved it!”
Reviews.Author: ABSL_11
Reviews.Content: I went here with my 9 month old and mom for a few days after our visit to Merida. It is a smaller hotel which I prefer over the big resorts because I think you get better service. There is a wonderful restaurant right downstairs and the hotel is located right in the heart of Playa. I would highly recommend staying here if you want something affordable and nice. Thanks to everyone there for making our stay wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “awsome place, awsome people,awsome price!”
Reviews.Author: richbass
Reviews.Content: had a great time , no need for one of those giant hotels, they have it all here.i would recommend to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Can't say Enough”
Reviews.Author: kvfr
Reviews.Content: Went to Playa on a wimse. heard about Hotel Cielo from a friend. I did not want the all inclusive thing I wanted to be free to go and do what we wanted. Well this place was the best. Central in the middle of town, right down from the beach which we could see from our room, walkable to anywhere in Playa. Staff was the best, the friendliest and the most helpful. We decided we wanted to go down to Talum and within 1 hour they made all the contacts for a rental car and we were off for the day. Anything we needed or wanted they were there for us. Can't beat the room rates and the restauranat is convient and good! We are counting the days to go again. We had such a good tme we are going again in the fall. Staff is fun get to know them, we now have friends down there!!

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Cielo: The Patrón of Playa”
Reviews.Author: scott_snizek
Reviews.Content: Picture a charming hotel that was built and owned by world travelers, fit & finished with authentic Mexican decor, and located in an old fishing town just steps from the turquoise beaches of the Caribbean. Add a margarita to the picture and loads of sunshine and you have Hotel Cielo... The friendly hospitality of everyone at Hotel Cielo reminded of the times I traveled through Mexico with my soccer team during the World Cup while staying with local players and their families along the way. Both times I felt like I was an honored guest of their family....Hotel Cielo's staff is exceptional. They will make sure you have the best time doing whatever you want to do while you stay there. The hotel is close to everything you want to explore in the Yucatan and the incredible beach is only a few steps away. The rooms are clean and comfortable and did I mention the service is great? I ran into the owners downstairs at Carboncitos and had a few beers and had lots of laughs while sharing stories of our travels. If you run into either of them, you will say the same. Keep a backpack packed (you won't need much more) and go back as often as you can. Hotel Cielo is a great little getaway where you will be treated like a welcomed friend.

Reviews.Title: “Greatest times!”
Reviews.Author: clau55
Reviews.Content: Hi there, Went to Playa some time ago and Hotel Cielo was great!! The rooms are not only very clean but very mexican style with a great finishing touch (mozaiek bathrooms etc). The location but also the hotel itslef is beautiful. It's not only comfortabel but it has a very good vibe. It looks great, the staff was more than friendly and if you wanna eat at the hotel, I can recomend that becauce you can eat delicieuse! It's not on the fifht but you have a good vieuw on the fifht so everything is near by. (like a couple of meters away) You should go there, we had an amazing time!!! Ow and the rooftop is amazing! Claudia Rotterdam The Netherlands

Reviews.Title: “Addictive!!!”
Reviews.Author: JeaPearl
Reviews.Content: What can I say, there are just a great bunch of people that work at the hotel....from the minute we arrived it was like coming "home".. Very friendly, accommodating and helpful in every aspect. I am going back again for more fun in the sun and I'm staying at Hotel Cielo!!!! The location can't be beat and the price?!? Well, pretty hard to complain about that either...lol.... All I can say is you have to try it to believe it. Having a restaurant right downstairs is convenient too, breakfast was yummy, lunch and dinner too...... A block away from the beach for getting a great tan, and if you want a party, it's just down the road, plenty of relaxing lounges, bars and also some really upbeat clubs and great dancing!!!!! See you soon Cielo!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Amazing place!”
Reviews.Author: ashleydavid
Reviews.Content: It was our first time to Mexico and Hotel Cielo was amazing! the rooms were immaculate, the staff were friendly and very helpful. the place was minutes to the beach. it was great value for money and it had an amazing rooftop view. i would definitely stay there and recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at the Hotel Cielo”
Reviews.Author: becca62272
Reviews.Content: The hotel is situated very close to the beach, the personnel was very nice, thanks Andrea, Miguel and Roberto. We rented a car and they were very helpful in suggesting and locating off beaten path places. I would definitely stay here again. The rooms were very clean, fresh towels everyday. There is a filtered water tank with cold water on the third floor to prevent you from going to buy water all the time. You need it in Playa, it can get very hot. Airconditioner worked very well, our room had a refrigerator but not all rooms had it. The breakfast was free at the time we made our reservations, good quality food at the restauarant.. real margaritas. The owners decided from now on to give half of breakfast instead of free. So you can choose whatever you want. One thing to note, the prices are going up but it is still a good deal. Good place to stay. The only thing I would recommend for Carboncitos the restaurant of the hotel is to please serve better coffee for breakfast. I am sure you can get good coffee in Mexico better than what you guys served. Thanks for the good service.

Reviews.Title: “HOTEL CIELO - AUTHENTIC, CLEAN, SAFE, & EXCELLENT”
Reviews.Author: j9fingers
Reviews.Content: Try Hotel Cielo! We just back from another stay there and we can't say enough about it! It's clean, safe, authentic, and they've got a great little place to eat as well called Carboncitos. Breakfast is included (try the French toast - YUM)... They also have a great afternoon 2x1 taco and drink special and it is so nice to grab a table by the street, watch the water only a block away, and ponder why you live anyplace else. For a better view go to the rooftop patio! Cielo is only a block off the beach and right off 5th so you're in a very good location, and Roberto -the front desk person is great. The staff is super nice as well. We love it and think about going back every day. BTW... Cost is usually about $60/night. You can't beat it! Why stay in another Hyatt wannabe when you can try something more authentic? Leave the I-Phone at home... Go and explore... You'll love it!

Reviews.Title: “great loacation, service and overall atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: groundskeeper1987
Reviews.Content: Hotel Cielo is great. its a minute walk to the beach,and also right by some great restaurants, bars, if you love the night life. i have to say, if you prefer big resorts that's fine, but this place had a more personalized feel, great service, and comfortable accomodations. being in close to so many things makes it easy to go out and find something to do. the roof hangout was great too.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place - Treated Like Family”
Reviews.Author: glordNC
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I stayed at Hotel Cielo for the first time (March 26 - March 30th), We were amazed at the value!, The hotel is very clean, the service was excellent, the location is really great , it is central to everything on Playa. It is walking distance to everything , the area is VERY safe and secure. The owner and the staff treat you like family, they are sincerely concerned that you have the best experience while you are staying there. We have stayed at many different places in the Playa area, but this is the BEST, in value, location, cleanliness and service!! The area is very safe! We went out at 4AM to take pictures, we felt very comfortable and safe. We stayed in an upper level room, it was so clean and very comfortable. WE WILL GO BACK!!

Reviews.Title: “Would not change a thing!”
Reviews.Author: dstoves
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had the absolute pleasure of staying @ Hotel Cielo this past March. We have been to Playa del Carmen many times but this had been our first stay @ Hotel Cielo. From the staff, to the rooms, to the restaurant and the proximity to the beach (1 block!) all were top notch. We have traveled to many “large resorts" in the past and decided that this vacation we wanted a more intimate vacation without all the hustle and bustle of the Sandals type resorts. And that exactly what we experienced. Quaint, relaxing atmosphere that had alot to offer and was easy on the pocket! Awesome value and we would not change a thing! Thank you for a memorable vacation experience. P.S. Take a look at this article my wife found in forbes.com highlighting Hotel Cielo. http://www.forbes.com/2011/03/07/bermuda-florida-cancun-culebra-lifestyle-travel-bargain-beach-getaways_slide_3.html

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful property, but............”
Reviews.Author: WorldTravellerr
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Hotel Cielo in March 2011. I have stayed in PDC many times, always in a different hotel. This property is beautiful. It's charming and house-like. Beautiful garden, tiles, woodwork and ironwork. The rooms are spacious and spotless. There are several things that if fixed could make this hotel even nicer, such as better bedding, lighting and closets. This hotel is a great budget option for those that don't mind uncomfortable beds and can sleep through anything. The hotel is in a busy, noisy part of PDC. The service at this hotel is top notch. All of the staff are gracious and accomodating. I had better service here than in some 5 star hotels. Kudos to all of the staff for their kindness! My stay started off in a great room at the front of the hotel. I had a balcony and view of the water. The room was HUGE and comfortable. The first night was miserable though. A store owner across the street from the hotel allowed full-on construction to be done in his store from MIDNIGHT to 5am!! That's right, drilling, hammering, voices shouting over the drilling. Unbelievable that a business owner could be that thoughtless and stupid. I went downstairs to the front desk at 1am to complain. They did go over and talk to the construction workers, but it didn't stop. Needless to say, I did not sleep the first night. In the morning, I asked to be moved to a room at the back of the hotel and was promptly given a different room at a lower rate. The room was nice, but darker and smaller. The armoire in the room reeked of mildew and I couldn't get the smell out even after I ran the AC all day. I ended up closing the doors to the armoire and that seemed to help. The bed in the first room I'd had was comfortable enough, but the bed in the smaller room was awful. It was lumpy and worn, making it hard to sleep comfortably or soundly. The noise at the back of the hotel was much less than the front, but I was able to get some sleep with the windows closed and the earplugs in. The other odd thing was the position of the faucets directly over the top of bathroom sink (I've attached a photo). It was impossible to bend down to wash your face or brush your teeth without smacking your head on the faucets. Quirky and annoying. The amenities at this hotel are TV, AC, hot showers with good pressure, free wifi (which always worked), in room safe (which really is too small to put anything but your wallet into), free beach towels (with refundable deposit) and a continental breakfast at the attached restaurant. There is a convenience store and laundry close by. I would recommend this hotel to those on a budget, who don't mind noise and uncomfortable beds. I probably would not return as I the older I get the more I value my sleep! Again, the service by ALL of the staff was impeccable.

Reviews.Title: “I will return!!”
Reviews.Author: SabinaWills
Reviews.Content: My husband and I fell in love with this quaint hotel. From the staff to the food to the atmosphere, everything was fabulous... Hanging out on the roof top was pretty awesome too! Thanks to staff of Hotel Cielo for the amazing time:)

Reviews.Title: “A great travel experience”
Reviews.Author: hollyone78
Reviews.Content: I am so happy that I chose Hotel Cielo for my first trip to Playa del Carmen. The location was great: a block away from the beach and all the action but also close to quieter areas for maybe a bit more of a local feel and just a short walk to the colectivo vans if you want to head out to Akumal or Tulum for the day. The entire staff was so nice and so helpful. It is nice to stay where you feel that the owners and staff really want you to enjoy your experience. I have travelled alone many times and it means a lot to feel that. Also as a solo female traveller, it's important to feel safe and secure which I always did. The rooms were very clean, the restaurant very nice. The whole experience could not have been better. I will definitely return and stay again. I almost look forward to next winter in NYC if it means an escape to Hotel Cielo and Playa!

Reviews.Title: “Blissful and inspiring, I've never been so comfortable in another country.”
Reviews.Author: ScubaS1985
Reviews.Content: Staying at Hotel Cielo is as much as a cultural experience as it is a vacation. All amenities are taken care of: Free Wifi, ac, TV, hot water, and comfortable beds dressed with class. Breakfast was complimentary and excellent; fresh produce and eggs are prime to get anyone’s day started in Carmen. The staff was extremely knowledgeable of the surrounding businesses and tours. They put us in contact with trusted businesses with more great rates: scuba diving, tours, and merchants which were upfront and fair. I was advised about out of this world restaurant, which I never would have found otherwise. The rooms had a pleasant decor and the rates were incredible. The location of the hotel is phenomenal. Just far enough away from the bar scene that you can get a good nights rest if you have morning plans, or be part of the night scene with out leaving the sanctity of the playa del Carmen area. The hotel itself is very secure with an honest staff. No one in our group of 4 rooms had problems with valuables. For the quality of service, information, rooms, and ambience there is no better steal in Playa del Carmen. I was astounded at the affordability and over all quality of Hotel Cielo.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel; central to everything happening in Playa and a great restaurant”
Reviews.Author: WalterLev
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at Hotel Cielo twice now and both times it has been a pleasure. The staff is competent and eager to please and co-owner Steve from New York is usually around to greet the guests and offer tips on where to go and what to do in the area. The architecture of the hotel has an eclectic Mexican flavor and each of the 18 rooms is unique. All of the rooms have A/C, free WiFi and color TV. Hotel Cielo is definitely a good choice for the budget minded traveler in Playa del Carmen, Mexico. Rooms run about $50 US in high season.

Reviews.Title: “Greatest deal you can ever find!”
Reviews.Author: zaoyap
Reviews.Content: I was there for 10 days and can't wait to go back! This charming boutique hotel has everything in a very comfort setting - the staff were so friendly, the service was excellent, my room was always very clean with hot water and air-condition.The decor brings out a very authentic Mexico atmosphere, especially the roof top! It has a mix of Asian and Mexican flavor with a beatiful view of the ocean! I even got to get a massage on the roof top which was to die for! I was there for my bday and the staff were so helpful that I end up going to Tulum and whale shake watching for a few days and got a great deal through this hotel! They have great connection with other business as well, it will be a great tool for travellers who like to do many different activities than just getting tan on the beach! I'm a girl who like to travel around and staying in unique hotels where I can get to know more cultural side of city. If you are a world traveler like me, you will not miss this cool spot!

Reviews.Title: “A HIDDEN GEM!”
Reviews.Author: magiclyl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had an unforgettable time here! We have visited Playa del Carmen on occasion from time to time. We stumbled upon this quaint hotel on one of our usual visits & promised each other our next visit will be at Hotel Cielo. It's location is the place to be right in town! The rooms are cozy & clean and loaded with CHARM! The beach is just across the street! The owners know where to go for local food off the beaten path or cute restaurants in town. Most times we stayed at their restaurant downstairs. It's one of the most serene stays we have had and we travel often. We will certainly be back! Miss you HOTEL CIELO!!!! Lily & Adam

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, friendly management, excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: Canadianprincess_10
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Cielo from March 7-21 with my boyfriend and we absolutely loved it. We stayed there a few times previously in November when I was there and decided to return for 2 weeks. The room was always very clean, the staff were very friendly and it was in an excellent location! We always had hot water, the air-conditioning was always working, and the rooms cleaned in a timely fashion. It was a little loud but it's Mexico! We thought it was a great value and look forward to staying there again perhaps in June/July :)

Reviews.Title: “DEMOLITION SITE”
Reviews.Author: bostonbobby
Reviews.Content: They are tearing down a building in back of hotel as I write and will be for a while. Working with lights at NIGHT! Back-up beeper going off all the time. Horrible~!!! The hotel is very nice but you can't sleep right now. Construction will be going on for some time. FYI

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and Convenient”
Reviews.Author: Slipawaycpl
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hotel Cielo one night in February 2011. Our room was comfortable and clean. The view from the rooftop was amazing! You can have a drink served up there. It’s a good location to the beach and restaurants in Playa del Carmen. Our breakfast was included with the room and served next door at Carboncitos.

Reviews.Title: “AN EXPERIENCE TO REMEMBER....THANKS”
Reviews.Author: jstluvinlife
Reviews.Content: Here are some people that really care. The staff , super friendly & informative. Rooms very quaint & clean and it seems many of the rooms different, pretty cool....peeked in a few others. The hotel (building ) it self was as interesting as the rooms, nicely desgined, roof top was beautiful Asian design, really neat with an amazing view, they should open it for drinks. The restaurant, food is really good, service a little slow, but hey...we´re on vacation. As for the owners of Hotel Cielo......These guys really care, they go out of their way for you to experience Playa at its best. Really good people. They make us want to come come back. Thanks

Reviews.Title: “excellent service at clean, perfectly located boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: manwanger
Reviews.Content: on a recent pass through playa del carmen, my wife, infant son, and i stayed a night at hotel cielo. the hotel was clean. the service was excellent. and above all, the location is unbeatable. the hotel is located a few blocks from the bus station and ferry dock. not to mention, it's a half block from the pedestrian shopping thoroughfare of fifth avenue. the staff speaks english and is offers information with eagerness. for 550 pesos, we received a room and breakfast for two. the on-site restaurant, carboncitos, was delicious. our waiter ruben was friendly and offered accurate area information. best of all, not a single hotel employee tried to sell us a timeshare!

Reviews.Title: “convient, friendly, affordable”
Reviews.Author: mrweekend1969
